title: Sum of Digits
description:
Given an integer n, return the sum of its digits.

For example, if n = 123, the digits are 1, 2, 3, and the sum is 1 + 2 + 3 = 6.
task:
Extract each digit of the given number and calculate their total sum.
The input can be a positive integer.
inputFormat: Line 1:n — the integer to process
outputFormat: A single integer representing the sum of the digits of n.
sampleInput:
// Input number

438
sampleExplanation: The digits of 438 are 4, 3, 8. Summing them: 4 + 3 + 8 = 15.
hints: Use the modulo operator (%) to get the last digit: n % 10.
Use integer division (/) to remove the last digit: n / 10.
Repeat this process in a loop until the number becomes zero.
